Name: learning_rate_schedule
Title: Adaptive Learning Rate Schedules: Comparing different learning rate schedules for diffusion models.
Experiment: In this experiment, we compare the performance of different learning rate schedules on diffusion model performance. We use the final estimated KL as the evaluation metric.

Name: rbf_embedding
Title: Exploring Radial Basis Function Embeddings for Low-Dimensional Diffusion Models
Experiment: In this experiment, we replace the sinusoidal embeddings with Radial Basis Function (RBF) embeddings in the diffusion model. We will implement an RBFEmbedding class and modify the MLPDenoiser class to utilize this new embedding. The performance of the model will be evaluated based on the KL divergence, inference time, and reconstruction quality, and compared with the baseline sinusoidal embedding.
